bug.author: alalek
bug.summary: videoio(MSMF): OpenCV "winpack" binaries fails to run on Win7 machine
bug.description:
Related <denchmark-link:https://github.com/opencv/opencv/commit/80600e5cdcf76bfe9663cc199a8bd3dc77aa8771#commitcomment-29402727>message</denchmark-link> :
MFCreateDXGIDeviceManager() does not exist in Win 7, so the whole library fails to load
